content.title: Intracranial Aneurysms in ADPKD
content.description: Association between autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease and intracranial aneurysms

key_concepts.details: Intracranial aneurysms occur in 6-11% of ADPKD patients vs 2-3% general population
Screen those with family history of subarachnoid hemorrhage or intracranial aneurysm
MRA preferred; repeat every 5-10 years if negative with positive family history
Treatment thresholds similar to general population; consider lower threshold if family history

content.clinical_significance: Leading cause of death in ADPKD other than renal failure
